pageTitle: Safety and Effectiveness of Lopinavir/Ritonavir in Individuals Who Have Failed Prior HIV Therapy - Study Results - ClinicalTrials.gov
textBeforeTable: Period 1:   Screening Participant Flow for 3 periods Participants will receive lopinavir/ritonavir twice daily for up to 104 weeks. Upon confirmation of virologic failure, emtricitabine (FTC)/tenofovir (TDF) once a day will be added to their regimen. LPV/r Monotherapy Description   Reporting Groups No text entered. Significant events and approaches for the overall study following participant enrollment, but prior to group assignment Pre-Assignment Details No text entered.
